caption.title: MP-specific antibody responses in DBS eluates and plasma in typhoid fever patients.
caption.p: The Bland-Altman analysis of MP-specific IgA (A), IgG (B), IgM (C) antibody responses between DBS eluates and plasma specimen of typhoid fever patients (n = 12) are shown. Spearman correlation of MP-specific IgA (D), IgG (E) and IgM (F) between DBS eluates and plasma specimen are shown.
